00012 #ifndef QPERPCALCULATOR3_H
00013 #define QPERPCALCULATOR3_H
00014 
00015 #include "../sw_templatemeta.h"
00016 #include "../constants.h"
00017 #include <boost/array.hpp>
00018 
00019 template<std::size_t n>
00020 void _Convert2DPolarToCartesian( boost::array<double, n> &qs, 
00021   boost::array<double, n> &thetas, boost::array<double, n> &qxs, boost::array<double, n> &qys )
00022 {
00023   for ( std::size_t i=0; i<n; ++i )
00024   {
00025     qxs[i] = qs[i] * cos( thetas[i] );
00026     qys[i] = qs[i] * sin( thetas[i] );
00027   }
00028 }
00029 
00033 template<std::size_t n>
00034 class QperpCalculator3
00035 {
00036 private:
00038   boost::array<boost::array<double, n>, TPower<2,n>::value> SumQs_1i;
00039   boost::array<boost::array<double, n>, TPower<2,n>::value> SumQs_ii;
00040   boost::array<boost::array<double, n>, TPower<2,n>::value> SumKhatQ_i;
00041 
00042   boost::array<boost::array<double, n+1>, TPower<2,n>::value> SumQsIncK_1i;
00043   boost::array<boost::array<double, n+1>, TPower<2,n>::value> SumQsIncK_ii;
00044 
00045 public:
00046   QperpCalculator3();
00047 
00048   void SetK( double k );
00049   void SetQsThetas( boost::array<double, n> Qs, boost::array<double, n> Thetas );
00050 
00051   double GetSumQskk( long m, long zeroes ) const
00052   {
00053     return ( SumQsIncK_ii[zeroes][m-1] );
00054   };
00055 
00056   double GetSumQs1k( long m, long zeroes ) const
00057   {
00058     return ( SumQsIncK_1i[zeroes][m-1] );
00059   };
00060 
00061 };

00064 QperpCalculator3<n>::QperpCalculator3()
00065 {
00066 
00067 }

00069 template<std::size_t n>
00070 void QperpCalculator3<n>::SetK( double k )
00071 {
00072   const double k2 = k*k;
00073   boost::array<double, n> sumkq_i;
00074   for ( long z=0; z<TPower<2,n>::value; ++z )
00075   {
00076     for ( std::size_t i=0; i<n; ++i )
00077     {
00078       sumkq_i[i] = k * SumKhatQ_i[z][i];
00079       SumQsIncK_1i[z][i] = SumQs_1i[z][i] + sumkq_i[0] + sumkq_i[i] + k2;
00080       SumQsIncK_ii[z][i] = SumQs_ii[z][i] + 2.*sumkq_i[i] + k2;
00081     }
00082     SumQsIncK_1i[z][n] = sumkq_i[0] + k2;
00083     SumQsIncK_ii[z][n] = k2;
00084   }
00085 }
00086 
00087 template<std::size_t n>
00088 void QperpCalculator3<n>::SetQsThetas( boost::array<double, n> Qs, 
00089   boost::array<double, n> Thetas )
00090 {
00091   boost::array<double, n> qxs, qys;
00092   _Convert2DPolarToCartesian<n>( Qs, Thetas, qxs, qys );
00093 
00094   boost::array<double, n> sumqxs, sumqys;
00095   bool notZeroed;
00096 
00097   for ( std::size_t z=0; z<TPower<2,n>::value; ++z )
00098   {
00099     notZeroed = !SwUtils::_TestBitI( z, 0 );
00100     sumqxs[n-1] = notZeroed*qxs[n-1]; sumqys[n-1] = notZeroed*qys[n-1];
00101     for ( std::size_t i=1; i<n; ++i )
00102     {
00103       std::size_t ind = n-1-i;
00104       notZeroed = !SwUtils::_TestBitI( z, i );
00105       sumqxs[ind] = sumqxs[ind+1] + notZeroed*qxs[ind];
00106       sumqys[ind] = sumqys[ind+1] + notZeroed*qys[ind];
00107     }
00108 
00109     for ( std::size_t i=0; i<n; ++i )
00110     {
00111       SumQs_1i[z][i] = sumqxs[0]*sumqxs[i] + sumqys[0]*sumqys[i];
00112       SumQs_ii[z][i] = sumqxs[i]*sumqxs[i] + sumqys[i]*sumqys[i];
00113       SumKhatQ_i[z][i] = -sumqxs[i];
00114     }
00115   }
00116 }
